actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide an 8 percent pay increase for General Schedule employees within the San Diego, California Metropolitan Statistical Area.

summary.text: Grants General Schedule employees in the San Diego, California, Metropolitan Statistical Area an eight percent interim geographic pay increase as provided to other General Schedule employees in certain high cost of living areas under the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990.

titles.title: A bill to provide an 8 percent pay increase for General Schedule employees within the San Diego, California Metropolitan Statistical Area.
